I think I will play this game for the rest of my life... even if something better somehow comes along, this is home... it's real craps casino style... if you wanna try your craps system you got to try it on craps trainer pro.

Great time.

content: Lots of 7's you say it is all in a rhythm...but hitting 14 7's between the 2nd and 4th roll of the dice is insane. Does not help me at all to develop strategies. Also your pay on the 4 and 10 commissions is wrong a buy on a 4 and 10 at 25 dollar's is 50 dollar's with a 1 dollar for the vig. You have a buy 4 and 10 with 25 dollar's paying at 46 dollar's with a 3 dollar vig.
Numbers don't appear to be random. They change according to your betting strategy.
replyContent: Kathryn.  What does random appear like?  People love craps for the streaks.  This is exactly what keeps casinos alive.  Random does not look like random unless you look at 420,000 rolls.  We have reviewed MILLIONS of rolls, and we are random.  Streaks are real. Play them, if you can catch them. Best of luck to you at the tables.

content: This has long been my #1 favorite app for over 3 years. developer support and improvements have been phenomenal, and gameplay is impeccable. Original Review (Only thing keeping it from 5 stars is that I would like Repeat Last Bet, and Double bet buttons. Giving it a 5, cause it's closer to 4.5)
replyContent: Thank you for the review, we are looking for ways to improve.  How do you envision a Repeat Last Bet and Double Bet button to work? Where would they be placed? How would they behave? You can email us at appmaster@e7systems.com

content: The Don't Pass bet still needs to be fixed!! The bet can be removed after a point is set. That's an illegal play.
replyContent: Jeff - Thanks for these excellent suggestions.  I can see how these side bets could make the game more exciting, in the app and at the table.  We pride ourselves on providing all the bets.  I'll look for some space on the game board.

content: Best craps game on mobile I've found. Worth it for the pro version for the extra options and buy bets. Customizable chip stacks make it easy to play any system you want.
replyContent: Tony,  Thanks so much for the great review we try to make this app especially useful to serious players. Best of luck to you.

content: Very easy to use and informative. 3 stars because the RNG on a roll is faulty. Despite previous claims that it's a 1 in 6 chance to roll a 7, that's not the case. After several batch tests of 100 rolls each, 7s land within an average of 11 rolls with light betting, within 5 rolls with heavy betting but when betting "any seven", it changes to every 23 rolls on average. This should literally be two rands of 1-6 combined each roll. Previous rolls or betting behavior shouldn't matter, but it does.
replyContent: Please try 100 rolls 5 times with real dice. I promise you the number of 7s you get will range wildly. It's called a "streak" and STREAKS HAPPEN RANDOMLY.  We test the RNG with tens of millions of rolls and we get sevens  1/6 of the time.  If you read dice expert blogs, they will tell you that you need 420k rolls minimum to smooth out streaks.

content: Edit March/2020: 19+ months to fix a paid app is unacceptable. My review stands. Original review on aug/2018: Crashes on a craps or point every few craps or points. Used to be awesome. Now it is very frustrating. Most current version (61) on an S9+. Oh well.
replyContent: I understand your frustration. All reviews are now sent directly to me, and we will be making more frequent updates to this application.

content: Uninstalling. I have played multiple strategies that USED to work on this game and have all worked in real casinos. Play the pass line you'll see more 7s than you can count after the come out, same with place bets. Play the don'ts and the come out is 7 after 7 and the point will usually hit. Lay 4 and 10 are usually great bets, but it's crazy how many will roll if you do it. No matter what bet you put, it'll make you lose. Thankfully, Pro was cheap enough that i don't care I wasted money on it
replyContent: Craps is a game of chance. Please don't leave reviews because of your luck. Our RNG produces 7s 1 in every 6 rolls. If you see more, that's called a streak.

content: Please add the feature to turn place bets on and off. Fix it and I'd rate it a 5 but as of now it's missing a very important option used frequently at casino craps tables and causes a great inconvenience having to take down and set back up bets constantly.
replyContent: Tom, You can turn your place bets ON and OFF by simply touching the puck. I'll add a Craps Assistant tooltip for that feature. Please try it and if you like it, update your review.

content: I've been using the free craps trainer for awhile. so I went ahead and paid for the Pro so I could make buy and lay bets. there is no way these rolls are random! it's like it knows my strategy and works to foil it every time. Even when I change to another strategy. On a lesser note, the game makes me put my place bets where the buy bets should go and makes buy bets out of my buy bets. I'm also not sure if it's paying out properly on lay bets.
replyContent: Craps is a game of chance. Please don't leave reviews because of luck. Our RNG produces 7s 1 in every 6 rolls. If you see more, that's called a streak.  Streaks are natural and they will be of random length.  But know that we count millions of dice rolls and there is no number that is statistically over-represented.

content: (I wrote much more, but am limited to 500 characters.) Program has major bugs. Bankroll total displayed after a win is wrong. Program's notion of a craps Hand is wrong (see Game Statistics screen). They have known about these kinds of problems for at least a year, but no fix. I was a beta tester last year, sending many email suggestions to them at that time. Nothing came of them. In fact, when I later inquired, they admitted they had lost my emails. Pathetic. Program could have been great.

NO MORE PATTERNS! This app is so rigged its FRUSTRATING! Having the 8 hit 5 times in a row when the DC goes to 8 and 7 on DC next, what R the odds!?! I enjoyed playing this game at first but once U realize it is geared for U to lose it loses its fun very quickly! Please fix this issue and make the rolls more random and not have patterns so it is fairer. It is very frustrating when the one number that can bust you is almost always expected when the computer learns your strategy it gets old quick!
replyContent: Craps is a game of chance. Please don't leave reviews because of your luck. Our RNG produces 7s 1 in every 6 rolls. If you see more, that's called a streak. We have NO reason to rig this app. Although it is tempting to make it MORE profitable to avoid bad reviews.

content: There are definite patters in the randomness. If something happens 30% of the time when stats say it should happen 10%, over 100s of dice rolls, something is up.

content: I like this game just 4 things that kept it from being perfect training tool. 1.  The money slider is way to sensitive. Instead it would be nice to see just a plain simple number pad so we can input our own starting amount. 2.  In the advanced settings some of the setting don't have descriptions as to what they do. For example under the dice roll randomizer it has about 6 different options to choose from but there is no description for each item. So you end up picking things and hoping you see a difference in the game. 3. The game kinda does something strange when playing. If you are betting low you almost can't pay a 7 to show up but the second I place 200 or more on a bet it shows up not just once but it literally came up 7 times in a row at one point. Please make it more true to life or at least let us know how to adjust the setting to get a better feel. And 4. Neither on my tablet or my phone the game doesn't fit on the screen I have to move it up in order to see my winnings and the bottom pass line or down to see the lay bets and place bets. Other than these few things the game is great I've learned a lot and have developed a strategy that make it almost impossible to lose that I actually tried at a real casino and won with a few times. Thanks
replyContent:
Thank you for your review. We now have a plain text field for input and updated the scaling to better fit all screen types.
Going forward we will expand our explanations of the settings.

Where are the lay bets this is a very common way to hedge on the come out roll if you are a dark side player.
replyContent: Thank you for waiting. The newest version with Lay and Buy bets is now available.

content: If i bet with $25 chips, then game is normal. If I have a $100 and $25 chip on the table I roll seven 4 of of 5 rolls. Something is wrong, refunding.
No available lay bets.
replyContent: Thank you for waiting the new version with Lay and Buy bets has been released (May 11th)

content: Very frustrating...Rolls craps "seven out" more than realistically have in real life casino play. It is a error in random programming. I won more on non-paid version. It is reactive to what's bets are being placed. The same rolled number comes up after the bet every time.
replyContent: We let the random be random.  The human mind finds patterns in everything.

content: The only way don't loose and keep playing it's putting MORE money on 'COME' field and protect it with appropriate bet on 'any crap'. It's feels like this app actually calculating total sum of money on the table and immediately punish you with 'seven' as soon as it's can hurt your account.

The only training that this does is teach me you can't train craps. Its not realistic odds are against you. I don't know how many times I rolled 3 times and then 7/out. If I put to much money on the table guaranteed I would lose it all. Sad that I wasted 1.99 for this
replyContent: We let the random be random. Probability states1 in 4 rolls will be a 7.

content: Here are my suggestions for improving the pro version of the app. 1) Move the bank down and crop the rest of the area so that there's no scrolling in the window. 2)  Allow Lay bets. 3) In the game stats, create a section for the number of times each number has been rolled, session and lifetime. 4) In the game stats, create a section for the number of times the point has been made and the number of times each number has repeated in the session. 5) Prevent Don't bets from being pulled down if they have odds.

Good to learn on but the odds have to be fixed somehow... When shooter makes his point 9 times in a row it's a bit ridiculous.  Maybe it's just me but no matter how you bet,  you will lose in a way that is against the method used.  Just an odd observation.  Otherwise,  good app.

This is a great app, I took off a star because it cannot zoom all out on the note 3 and it is annoying when it scrolls. I know I can lock zoom and scroll but it can block some visibility. I thought this was google ads causing it in the free one, but nope.
More 7's once the point is made than anything else.  Can't ever get a roll going. Not fun at all.
replyContent: New version released, please update.

content: Awful, literally do not buy this. You roll a seven almost every time. Waste of money.

I just upgraded to the Pro version. I love that you have the hop bets and that your payouts are consistent with most casinos.  To make it perfect you should add Buy and Lay Bets.    Also the "Place to Lose" bet (opp of place bet & similar to a Lay bet, need a 7 prior to the number bet on). It is available at some tables and the new electronic craps machines in Vegas. Caesar's odds are as follows: 4/10= 1to2, 5/9=2to3, and 6/8= 5to6.    As someone else noted, I too would like to see the ability to take bets on/off with a marker.  Also the ability to have your bets (place,hardway,etc) work on the come out roll. thanks for the great app.
replyContent: Thank you, Buy and Lay bets are in test now.  Try tapping the Mark before the point is set to enable all your place bets.  We will look into Place to Lose and turning on and off bets with a marker.

I can't lay bets. If that was fixed, I'd cheerfully increase my score. As of now, a vital part of the game is missing.

content: I wish you could change there odds to match the odds of the casino you are playing at

By far the best craps game on android. Well worth the money! Still a bit of upgrading to do but devs have been awesome about returning emails and taking suggestions. All around a great experience with good support. Thanks guys!

After installing this game, my battery began to drain extremely fast. I played it for about 10 minutes and then quit. My phone was at 35%.  Within the next hour or two (not using my phone) my battery dropped to 10%. Uninstalled and want a refund.
replyContent: If an app is draining battery check your Task manager go to Active applications and End it.  Refund is through Google Play.

content: Tbere are a lot of things that need to be added for all of the uncommon bets that people play such as the fire bet. (Look up route 66 casino to learn about the fire bet.)  The 7 comes up a lot. Instead of using the random number picker, use a math equation to determine the dice throws. set it to multiply the total amount on the table by the number of the last throw, and divided by the number of throws in succession. Have the ai take the last 2 digits as a certain value for each die.

While the updates are getting better, the rolls are getting worse and worse. Whenever my point is eight, and I place odds, I immediately get a seven. The GA stats may not be  able show the sevens in relation to the six and eight rolls.
replyContent: Glad the updates are getting better however we have not changed any dice logic.

I've noticed that since the update, nothing has changed in regards to being able to make lay bets. What kind of game of craps is this where u can make place bets, but u can't make lay bets? Fix it.

content: This game rolls more of "the bad number" then I have ever seen on my worst of days at a real table. After the point is set, you will 7 out in 1 to 4 rolls. Hardly ever get back your buy in to start pressing bets. Major money loser. If it teaches you anything, you will become a master of dont bets! Way to many 7 outs very quickly and consistantly. Wish I never paid for this!

This app just basically keeps statistics of your play. Very unclear instructions while playing. This app should tell you if the bet is a smart one or not based on odds, etc. It offers no recommendation of what you should bet either.
replyContent: Thanks for the review.  We acknowledge that we are missing some key training elements and are working to create them.  But rather than tell the someone how to play, we want you to learn by playing. Tap each region, read it and learn what it does. The cash is free and the statistics reveal how your strategy is working.

content: Have sent a few emails in regards to odds/playing the don'ts and the developer made appropriate changes. For that, Thank you. However, I have a few more requests before I give five stars. First, when playing the don'ts you can switch to the passline (there's more to it but this alone will help with my strategy). Next is buy and lay bets. The vigorous is 5% ($1 from $20-$39, etc) and like with DC odds lay bets are always working. And last is to keep bets up from winnings like from a horn bets or hop bets.
replyContent: Thanks Art, your advice has/is helping shape this App.

content: Would have given it 5 stars but 3-4-5 Don't Pass / Don't Come odds are incorrect. Playing the dark side at a 3-4-5X table, max odds should be 6 times the flat bet.  Playing the dark side at a 3-4-5X odds table, the max odds will always be 6X the flat bet (don't pass or don't come).  For example, assume a flat bet of $5 on the Don't Pass Line.  Max odds should be $30, regardless of the point established.  Odds payout on Don't Pass odds bets are true odds of: 1 to 2 on 4/10, 2 to 3 on 5/9, 5 to 6 on 6/8.  Winning payouts on the Don't Pass odds will be as follows:  $15 for the 4/10, $20 for the 5/9, $25 for the 6/8.  If you notice, for a flat $5 bet on Don't Pass backed up with $30 (6X) Don't Pass odds the Don't Pass odds winnings of $15, $20, $25 are in line with the 3-4-5X table payout.
replyContent: Great detailed explanation!  Thank you for taking the time to write back, EDIT updated  in version 1.4.2

content: I would've gave it more stars if the game is not rigged to make you lose. The dice roll is computerizes and seems to favor for the house.  It's like it "knows" which bets are the most profitable so you lose money quicker.
replyContent: Thanks for the review.  Craps Trainer was designed for learning rules and how to play craps.  There is no bias to make you loose and the house win.  Be careful what you think as this app may respond to the morphic fields generated by you.

content: Great game. It rocks!

Seems like there is always 3-4  bad comeouts, depending on how you play.  If im on domt pass it'll hit 7 and 11, maybe a craps inbetween, if I bet high, like 1k on dont pass, the fame usually hits the point.  Either I have uncommonly bad luck at random, or the game is fixed to make you lose.  4 stars for now, overall.the game is good, but I do wonder how the code looks at times.  Auto same betting would be nice too
replyContent: Thanks for the review.  Be aware of the Gambler's fallacy also know as the Monte Carlo fallacy.  This is when a person believes the results of previous toss have a bearing on the outcome of the next toss.

Didn't take long for me to buy the pro version.   Overall, it's a solid game!

content: Updated review: this game is basically unplayable for me because of the amount of 7s that get rolled. Want to really like it, but I can't get more than 2 rolls past the point without a 7 popping up.   The controls are a little difficult, the bet placement needs to be the whole zones, particularly on odds bets. Nicely done, just need to fix logic and tweak interface.
replyContent:
We suggest you learn to play against the better with Don't Come and Don't Pass bets.  Just be wary when playing with others as this behaviour is frowned upon to say the least.
Bet placement has been updated to be ~%20 larger.

content: The odds on this game are messed up. I have never seen more 7s than any other craps game I have played and that includes at the casino.  I rolled 7, 7's in a row, then came out on a 6 and on my second roll hit a 7. I haven't once rolled more than 5 times toward my point without hitting a 7. Not once. In fact you'll be lucky to get 4 rolls toward your point before a 7 lands. THIS APP SHOULD BE CALLED BLOWS. Cuz crap is to kind.
replyContent:
Seems like you are prone to roll sevens...Maybe bet on sevens, not against them?
We are looking into the amount of sevens being rolled, but are waiting on more statistics (~500,000 rolls will create statistical significance)

content: One problem, holding you from 5 stars. you can collect your passline bet after an point has been established. If you try to put it back it says "you can't add to the passline". If you try to play without it says "player must establish a pass line bet" help!

Thus stopping the error you have of being stuck with no passline or dont pass bet once the point is established.

content: Good trainer but needs work. The pass line odds are supposed to be off. Once the point is made you should remove the pass line odds. You are not supposed to get paid pass line odds on a 7 or 11. You should also have a clear all option.
